data.name: RPGScenery - Waterfalls
data.detailed_description:
Between two statues covered with lianas in the jungle's depths, a river's water rushes into a small pond. A long time ago, one or more stone buildings were in their place, but now only a few ruined walls are left as a reminder of them. The water leaves the basin through waterfalls in all directions, falling into new basins, from where it then flows into a lake at the bottom of the valley.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
